_buildAuto: https://github.com/runem/web-component-analyzer => run: wca analyze src --format json --outFile custom-elements.json/

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Global reference to object with array where `item: {value:any, color?:string, tooltip?:string}`

attributes.name: width
attributes.description:
Width of each segment; expected 1..100 (perecentage) 
 @defaultValue 10

attributes.name: back
attributes.description:
Enable background circle 
 @defaultValue true

attributes.name: corner
attributes.description:
Border/corner radius of each segment; expected 0..0.5 where 0.5 == 50% of `$options.width` 
 @defaultValue 0.25

attributes.name: from
attributes.description:
Angle from that rendering is started -360..360 (degrees) 
 @defaultValue 0

attributes.name: to
attributes.description:
Angle to that rendering is finished -360..360 (degrees) 
 @defaultValue 360

attributes.name: min
attributes.description:
Min possible value that fits `from` 
 @defaultValue 0

attributes.name: max
attributes.description:
Max possible value that fits `to` 
 @defaultValue 100

attributes.name: space
attributes.description:
Space between segments; expected 0..20 (degrees), 
 @defaultValue 2

attributes.name: minsize
attributes.description:
Min segment size - to avoid rendering extra-small segments; expected 0..20 (degrees) 
 @defaultValue 10

attributes.name: firstweekday
attributes.description: First day of week in calendar where 1-Monday, 7-Sunday @defaultValue gathered from localeInfo.firstWeekDay

attributes.name: utc
attributes.description: Provide local or UTC date; min/max/exclude $initValue/$value must be provided according to this @defaultValue true

attributes.name: startwith
attributes.description: Picker that must be rendered at first; if undefined & isEmpty - `year`, otherwise - `day`

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: User can't select date less than min; format `yyyy-MM-dd`

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: User can't select date more than max; format `yyyy-MM-dd`

attributes.name: exclude
attributes.description:
Dates that user can't choose
 Global reference to object with array of dates

attributes.name: initvalue
attributes.description: Default value in strict format `yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss.fff`

attributes.name: label
attributes.description:
Title/label of control 
 @defaultValue null that means auto=>parsed from option [name]. To skip point `label=''` (empty string)

attributes.name: name
autofocus
attributes.description: Focus element when it's appended to layout @defaultValue false

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description:
Name to autocomplete by browser; Point `true` to inherit from $options.name or some string if control has no autocomplete option then it's inherited from form 
 @defaultValue null - means false if form.$options.autoComplete false also

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disallow edit/copy value; use attr [disabled] for styling

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Disallow copy value; use attr [readonly] for styling @defaultValue false

attributes.name: validations
attributes.description:
Rules enabled for current control (related to $defaults.validationRules); 
 Point Global reference to object

attributes.name: storagekey
attributes.description: Storage key for auto saving value in storage. Point `true` to use built-in key-generator or point custom key

attributes.name: storage
attributes.description:
Type of storage for saving value 
 @defaultValue `local`

attributes.name: reverse
attributes.description: Reversed-style (checkmark+label for true vs label+checkmark)

attributes.name: initvalue
attributes.description: Default value in boolean representation

 @defaultValue null that means auto=>parsed from option [name]. To skip point `label=''` (empty string)

properties.name: $onShowMenu
properties.description: Fires after popup-menu is shown (after animation finishes)

properties.name: $onHideMenu
properties.description: Fires after popup is hidden (after animation finishes)

properties.name: $isShown
properties.description: Returns if popup-menu is opened

properties.name: $refPopup
properties.description: Reference to popupMenu

properties.name: refMask
properties.description: Mask object to proccess mask on input

properties.name: $ariaCleared
properties.description: Text announced by screen-readers when control cleared; @defaultValue `cleared`

properties.name: $ariaError
properties.description: Text announced by screen-readers; @defaultValue `Error for`

properties.name: $onChange
properties.description: Called on value change

properties.name: $isEmpty
properties.description: Returns true if value is empty string or undefined

properties.name: $isRequired
properties.description: Returns if value is required - can't be undefined (depends on $options.validations.required)

properties.name: $refLabel
properties.description: Reference to nested HTMLElement

properties.name: $refInput
properties.description: Reference to nested HTMLElement

properties.name: $refTitle
properties.description: Reference to nested HTMLElement tied with $options.label

properties.name: $refError
properties.description: Reference to nested HTMLElement tied with errorMessage

properties.name: override
properties.description: Parse string to Date

properties.name: storageKey
properties.description: Returns storage key based on options `skey` and `name`

properties.name: $value
properties.description: Current value of control; You can change it without affecting on $isDirty state

properties.name: $initValue
properties.description:
Default/init value; used to define isChanged & to reset by keyEsc/buttonClear;
If control not $isDirty and not changed $value is updated according to $initValue

properties.name: $isDirty
properties.description: True if control is touched by user

properties.name: $isChanged
properties.description:
Returns if value changed (by comparisson with $initValue via static.isEqual option)
By default values compared by valueOf if it's possible

properties.name: $isValid
properties.description: Returns true if control is valid

properties.name: $isFocused
properties.description: Returns if current control is active/focused

properties.name: $isDisabled
properties.description: Returns if related form or control disabled (true even if form.$options.disabled && !control.$options.disabled)

properties.name: $isReadOnly
properties.description: Returns if related form or control readonly (true even if form.$options.readOnly && !control.$options.readOnly)

properties.name: $autoComplete
properties.description: Returns autoComplete name if related form or control option is enabled (and control.$options.autoComplete !== false )

properties.name: canShowError
properties.description: Returns true on !$isDisabled

properties.name: $defaults
properties.description: Global default options applied to every element. Change it to configure default behavior OR use `element.$options` to change per item

properties.name: $isReady
properties.description: Returns true if element is appended (result of setTimeout on connectedCallback)

properties.name: $options
properties.description: Options inherited from `static.$defauls` and applied to element. Use this to change behavior per item OR use `$defaults` to change globally
properties.type: { label?: string | null | undefined; name?: string | null | undefined; autoComplete?: string | boolean | null | undefined; readOnly?: boolean | null | undefined; disabled?: boolean | null | undefined; }

properties.description: Returns validations enabled by user & defaults
properties.type: { min?: number | ValidityFunction<string> | undefined; max?: number | ValidityFunction<string> | undefined; email?: boolean | ValidityFunction<string> | undefined; _mask?: string | ... 1 more ... | undefined; _parse?: string | ... 1 more ... | undefined; isNumber?: boolean | ... 1 more ... | undefined; required?: bo...

properties.name: storageKey
properties.description: Returns storage key based on options `skey` and `name`

properties.name: $value
properties.description: Current value of control; You can change it without affecting on $isDirty state

properties.name: $initValue
properties.description:
Default/init value; used to define isChanged & to reset by keyEsc/buttonClear;
If control not $isDirty and not changed $value is updated according to $initValue

properties.name: $isDirty
properties.description: True if control is touched by user

properties.name: $isChanged
properties.description:
Returns if value changed (by comparisson with $initValue via static.isEqual option)
By default values compared by valueOf if it's possible

properties.name: $isValid
properties.description: Returns true if control is valid

properties.name: $isFocused
properties.description: Returns if current control is active/focused

properties.name: $isDisabled
properties.description: Returns if related form or control disabled (true even if form.$options.disabled && !control.$options.disabled)

properties.name: $isReadOnly
properties.description: Returns if related form or control readonly (true even if form.$options.readOnly && !control.$options.readOnly)

properties.name: $autoComplete
properties.description: Returns autoComplete name if related form or control option is enabled (and control.$options.autoComplete !== false )

properties.name: canShowError
properties.description: Returns true on !$isDisabled

properties.name: $defaults
properties.description: Global default options applied to every element. Change it to configure default behavior OR use `element.$options` to change per item

properties.name: $isReady
properties.description: Returns true if element is appended (result of setTimeout on connectedCallback)

properties.name: $options
properties.description: Options inherited from `static.$defauls` and applied to element. Use this to change behavior per item OR use `$defaults` to change globally
properties.type: { label?: string | null | undefined; name?: string | null | undefined; autoComplete?: string | boolean | null | undefined; readOnly?: boolean | null | undefined; disabled?: boolean | null | undefined; }

attributes.name: hideonpopupclick
attributes.description:
Hide menu on popup click 
 @defaultValue true

tags.name: wup-form
tags.description: Wrapper of FormHTMLElement that collect values from controls

attributes.name: submitactions
attributes.description:
Actions that enabled on submit event; You can point several like: `goToError | collectChanged` 
  @defaultValue goToError | validateUntiFirst | reset | lockOnPending

attributes.name: autosave
attributes.description: Enable to store data in localStorage to prevent losing till submitted @defaultValue false

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: Focus first possible element when it's appended to layout @defaultValue false

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disallow edit/copy value; use attr [disabled] for styling @defaultValue false

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Disallow copy value; use attr [readonly] for stylin @defaultValue falseg

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Enable/disable browser-autocomplete; if control has no autocomplete option then it's inherited from form @defaultValue false

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Anchor that popup uses for placement @defaultValue `previousSibling` Point querySelector, for example `#some-id`

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: Placement rules relative to target @defaultValue `top-middle`

attributes.name: animation
attributes.description: Animation applied to popup @defaultValue `default`

tags.name: wup-spin
tags.description: Flexible animated element with ability to place over target element without position relative

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description:
Place inside parent as inline-block otherwise overflow target in the center (`position: relative` is not required); 
 @defaultValue false

attributes.name: fit
attributes.description:
Allow to reduce size to fit parent (for max-size change css-var --spin-size) 
 @defaultValue `auto` => `false` when inline:true, `true` when inline:false

attributes.name: overflowoffset
overflowfade
attributes.description: Allow to create shadowBox to partially hide target (only for `inline: false`) @defaultValue false

attributes.name: overflowtarget
